document.full_text: pearson and mcgraw-hill, announced  they are investing in inkling, an online seller of  interactive textbooks, and they have also agreed to add their titles to inkling's service.
document.title: e-textbooks get a lift from publishers
lines_and_colors: pearson and mcgraw-hill, announced  they are investing in inkling, an online seller of  interactive textbooks, and they have also agreed to add their titles to inkling's service.
